details.title: Use "apk add" with --no-cache
alerts: Use --no-cache option if use 'apk add': /bin/sh -c echo "Installing Nmap" &&     apk update &&     apk upgrade &&     apk add build-base &&     apk add flex &&     apk add libcap-dev &&     apk add openssl-dev &&     apk add libssh2-dev &&     apk add bison &&     apk add curl

details.title: Create a user for the container
alerts: Last user should not be root

details.title: Add HEALTHCHECK instruction to the container image
